textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure no file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*([^#\n\r]+)?::AllowUnauthenticated\h+"?true"?;\h*(#.*)?$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/security/limits.d exists and matches pattern ^\h*\*\h+hard\h+core\h+0\b(\h*#.*)?$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/dconf/db/local.d/ exists and matches pattern ^\h*logout\h*=\h*(''|"")?\h*(#.*)?$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.(conf|sources) in /etc/chrony/ exists and matches pattern ^\h*(server|pool)\h+\H+
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf in /etc/systemd/ exists and matches pattern ^\h*(NTP|FallbackNTP)=\H+

file_test.comment: Ensure any file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and is owned by 0:0 and does not have permissions --xrwxrwx

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^\h*(?i)(allow|deny)(users|groups)\h+"?\H+"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*LogLevel\h+\"?(QUIET|FATAL|ERROR|DEBUG|DEBUG1|DEBUG2|DEBUG3)\"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*UsePAM\h+"?no"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*PermitRootLogin\h+"?(yes|prohibit-password|forced-commands-only)"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*HostbasedAuthentication\h+"?yes"?\b
Ensurefile(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*PermitEmptyPasswords\h+\"?yes\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*PermitUserEnvironment\h+"?yes"?\b
Ensurefile(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*ignorerhosts\h+"?no"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*x11forwarding\h+"?yes"?\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*AllowTcpForwarding\h+\"?yes\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*LoginGraceTime\h+\"?(0|6[1-9]|[7-9][0-9]|[1-9][0-9][0-9]+|[^1]m)\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*MaxSessions\h+"?(1[1-9]|[2-9][0-9]|[1-9][0-9][0-9]+)\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*ClientAliveCountMax\h+"?0\b
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/sudoers.d/ exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*Defaults\h+([^#\n\r]+,)?use_pty(,\h*\h+\h*)*\h*(#.*)?$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/sudoers.d exists and matches pattern ^(?i)\h*Defaults\h+([^#]+,\h*)?logfile\h*=\h*(\"|\')?\H+(\"|\')?(,\h*\H+\h*)*\h*(#.*)?$
Ensurefile(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/sudoers.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*([^#\n\r]+\h*)?\bNOPASSWD\b(.*)?$
Ensurefile(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/sudoers.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*([^#\n\r]+\h+)?\!authenticate\b(\.*)?$
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/sudoers.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*defaults\h+(?:[^#\n\r]+\h*,\h*)?timestamp_timeout=(-1|1[6-9]|[2-9][0-9]|[1-9][0-9][0-9]+)\b(\h*,\h*.*)?$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf$ in /etc/sssd/conf.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*offline_credentials_expiration\h*=\h*1\h*(#.*)?$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.sh$ in /etc/profile.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\s*UMASK\s+\s*(0[0-7][2-7]7|[0-7][2-7]7|u=(r?|w?|x?)(r?|w?|x?)(r?|w?|x?),g=(r?x?|x?r?),o=)\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+\.sh$ in /etc/profile.d/ exists and matches pattern \bTMOUT=(600|[1-5][0-9][0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|[1-9])\b
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.sh$ in /etc/profile.d/ exists and matches pattern \bTMOUT=(600|[1-5][0-9][0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|[1-9])\b
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/systemd/journald.conf.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*Compress\h*=\h*yes\b
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/systemd/journald.conf.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*Storage\h*=\h*persistent\b
Ensure no file(s) named ^.+$ in /etc/systemd/journald.conf.d/ exists and matches pattern (?i)^\h*ForwardToSyslog\h*=\h*yes\b
Ensure at least one file(s) named .*\.conf in /etc/rsyslog.d/ exists and matches pattern ^\s*\$FileCreateMode\s+0[6420][40]0\s*(\s+#.*)?$
Ensure at least one file(s) named .*\.conf in /etc/rsyslog.d/ exists and matches pattern ^\s*\*\.\*\s+@
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf in /etc/rsyslog.d/ exists and matches pattern ^\h*(auth(\.\*)?,authpriv\.\*|authpriv\.\*,auth(\.\*)?)\h+\/var\/log\/secure\/?\h*(#.*)?$
Ensure at least one file(s) named ^.+\.conf in /etc/rsyslog.d/ exists and matches pattern ^\h*daemon\.notice\h+\/var\/log\/messages\/?\h*(#.*)?$
Ensurefile(s) named .*\.conf in /etc/rsyslog.d/ exists and matches pattern ^\s*\*\.\*\s+@
